Uses of Class
io.permazen.PermazenClass

Packages that use PermazenClass
Package
Description
io.permazen
Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.

  • Uses of PermazenClass in io.permazen

    Method
    Description
    <T> PermazenClass<? super T>
    Permazen.findPermazenClass(Class<T> type)
    Find the most specific PermazenClass for which the give type is a sub-type of the corresponding Java model type.

    Get the PermazenClass associated with the object ID.

    Get the PermazenClass modeled by the given type.

    Get the PermazenClass associated with the given object type name.

    Get the PermazenClass of which this field is a member.

    PermazenObject.getPermazenClass()
